description: green mottled stone with black cloudy elements and white veins; carved into the form of a man kneeling on his PL knee, with his PR arm held in a curved position away from the body, PR fingertips touching his PR knee; man holds an animal bone pipe in his PL hand; man wears a parka with the hood down, large mittens and a pack on his back; pipe removable

title: Untitled
